thread.title: perfect stay in Paris
thread.title_full: perfect stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Cecilia Arc De Triomphe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jcw174
title: perfect stay in Paris
text: Visiting a city for the first time is always a bit daunting trying to find a place to stay that won't be a disappointment. During this research process, I found a real gem in Paris. Hotel Cecilia provides it all perfect location, wonderful staff, comfortable room, lovely breakfast! We enjoyed staying at Hotel Cecilia so much, we're going back this fall!
